title: Collaborative Learning-Based Blended Social Problem-Solving Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational ability to analyze social issues and experience using digital communication tools
context.additional_context: Need to structure asynchronous collaborative activities optimized for mobile-centric learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can analyze real-world social problems and propose solutions through team-based projects, meeting an 85%+ accuracy threshold
Learners demonstrate interactive abilities by exchanging peer feedback at least three times using collaborative learning tools (mobile chat, cloud documents, etc.)
Learners achieve over 70% participation rates relative to self-directed learning time in blended learning environments while completing assignments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
